headline: Is It Too Late To Consider RTX (RTX) After A 62.8% One Year Rally?
summary: If you are looking at RTX and wondering whether the current price still lines up with its underlying worth, you are not alone. This article is built to help you size up the stock through a valuation lens. RTX recently closed at US$201.14, with reported returns of 2.6% over 7 days, 3.6% over 30 days, 7.4% year to date, 62.8% over 1 year, 113.1% over 3 years and 209.5% over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about what is already priced in and where the balance of risk and reward now...
